requirements.academic_requirements: 5-year Italian secondary diploma (Diploma di Scuola Secondaria superiore) or equivalent foreign diploma. 4-year diploma holders may be admitted with supplementary year or professional enrichment.

application_fee.notes: Registration tax including regional tax and stamp duty

admissions.notes: Specific programs may have additional requirements. Health professions and Medicine have national entrance exams.

tuition.notes: COA (Contributo Onnicomprensivo Annuale) varies based on ISEE income assessment

tuition.payment_schedule_notes: COA ≤€250: single payment by Jan 31. €250-500: 2 installments (Jan 31, May 31). >€500: 3 installments (Jan 31, Mar 31, May 31)
tuition.notes: Tuition based on ISEE Università assessment. Calculator available on website.
